Our 50% Promise

Your EcoSurvivor purchase supports Water4’s mission of eliminating the world water crisis that impacts nearly 1 billion people and causes over 3 million preventable deaths every year.

Who is JASCO?

As the parent brand of EcoSurvivor, Jasco believes in the power of developing products and building partnerships that are making a difference. Every EcoSurvivor purchase helps fuel clean water initiatives that are changing lives and saving lives around the world.
